description:
Two of Bunchu`s men, Chou Keihou and Fu Lin, use their Paopei to capture Kou Hiko, Kou Tenka, and the young Yin princes. It`s up to Taikoubou and his friends to save them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taikoubou, Kou Hiko to Deau Koto
Taikun rencontre le Général Fun Faze
太公望, 黄飛虎と出会う事
